title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) is up 1.01% Wednesday In Premarket Trading
text:
Tesla Inc (TSLA) has risen Wednesday morning, with the stock increasing 1.01% in pre-market trading to 179.47. 


TSLA's short-term technical score of 46 indicates that the stock has traded less bullishly over the last month than 54% of stocks on the market. In the Auto Manufacturers industry, which ranks 111 out of 146 industries, Tesla Inc ranks higher than 64% of stocks.

Tesla Inc has fallen 7.45% over the past month, closing at $202.04 on February 28. During this period of time, the stock fell as low as $162.50 and as high as $205.30. TSLA has an average analyst recommendation of Sell. The company has an average price target of $207.96.





 TSLA has an Overall Score of 37. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on TSLA!
See Full TSLA Report



Tesla Inc has a Long-Term Technical rank of 20. This means that trading over the last 200 trading days has placed the company in the lower half of stocks with 80% of the market scoring higher. In the Auto Manufacturers industry which is number 100 by this metric, TSLA ranks better than 100% of stocks.



Important Dates for Investors in TSLA:


-Tesla Inc is set to release earnings on 2024-04-17. Over the last 12 months, the company has reported EPS of $4.30.


-We do not have a set dividend date for Tesla Inc at this time.
